felting bag or bowl if you are using particularly fuzzy yarn you might want to put the bag or bowl in a pillow case or laundry bag to catch some of the fluff boil a kettle of water in the mean time set washer to hot water and small load setting add a couple drops of strong degreasing dish washing soap place the piece in the washing machine and pour the boiling water in a circular motion to mix it it can be very helpful to add old tennis balls or jeans to the load to help with the agitation do not use towels because they tend to make the wool pill let it agitate for about 10 minutes no longer use tongs to remove items from washer to check size if the item needs to continue to felt throw it back in for another 3 - 5 minutes keep doing this until the bag or bowl is the size you want
